nodes.text: The Night Beast is a comic strip written by Archie Goodwin and illustrated by Al Williamson, published by the Los Angeles Times Syndicate from March to May 1982. It was later reprinted in Amazing Heroes magazine #24–26.

It was republished by Dark Horse Comics, beginning on page 16 of Classic Star Wars 8, and completing in Classic Star Wars 9. It was later republished on StarWars.com's webstrips section of Hyperspace.
The March 21 Sunday strip's Star Wars Scrapbook section featured the bounty hunter Dengar but erroneously called him Zuckuss.
